nodes.text: Cataclysm was a painting available in the galaxy during the Galactic Civil War sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It depicted the planet Mustafar with lava erupting all around it, out of its atmosphere into space.

Cataclysm was a painting available in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies. It was added to the game in the 2005 expansion pack Trials of Obi-Wan. It could be used in the player's home as decoration. It was made from a schematic which comes from inserting three Force-infused items—a chemical antidote, an ammo box, and a shisha—into the Chu-Gon Dar cube, a Jedi relic capable of transmogrification through the Force. These items were looted from the corpses of the various enemies found on Mustafar. Once combined, it produces a schematic of the painting which could be used up to ten times by a Structures Trader to make copies of the painting.
